title: Intel 9900K - Making AMD Look Good?
description: The Intel 9900K is supposed to be the fastest CPU for gaming ever created but it also costs a lot more than the AMD Ryzen 2700X.  So is the Intel Core i9 9900k processor worth it or does Ryzen offer a better value?    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  NZXT H500i:   i9-9900K:   i7-9700K:   i5-9600K:   Z390 STRIX-E:   Z390 ITX:   Z390-A:    Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by Intel. This video is sponsored by NZXT. As per HWC guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #intel9900k #inteli99900k #hardwarecanucks
